body.name: ZeeFu Convertible Sectional Couch,3-Seat L-Shaped Furniture with Storage Reversible Ottoman and Pockets Modern Snowflake Velvet Upholstered Sofa for Living Room Small Space Apartment, Light Grey
features: 【CLASSIC LOOK】-Please recognise the products sold in the DMMM shop.Simple and classic appearance design, can easily match a variety of home styles, Small convertible sectional sofa couch can make full use of the limited living space, whether in the living room, apartment or office, are the perfect choice, you can relax and rest or watch TV, spend more relaxed leisure time.

【SOFT & COMFORTABLE】-The sectional sofa couch set is made of high-quality snowflake velvet fabric, skin-friendly and breathable, soft to the touch, filled with high-density foam sponge, with better resilience and softness, when you sit on the sofa, you will feel the fluffy cushion back cushion will bring you comfortable and soft support, giving you a sense of relaxation.

【STURDY & DURABLE】-The 3-seat L-shaped upholstered sofa couch set is made of high quality wood and metal, providing a sturdy frame for improved stability and durability. 6 sofa legs provide excellent stability and can easily support up to 800 pounds, ensuring the Modern Upholstered Sofa Set stands the test of time and you can count on our sofas.

【MOVABLE & STORAGE】-The ottoman can be moved and freely DIY to achieve a multifunctional recliner design that provides maximum comfort. Sofa side pockets and ottoman have built-in storage space to store blankets and various items, making the room look neat and clean，adding some practical features to your home.

【EASY ASSEMBLY】-3-Seat sectional sofa size: 78"*29"*33", ottoman size: 24"*23"*18.5". Effectively packaged in a box with detailed instructions and toolkit, anyone can easily install it in 30 minutes. If you have any questions after purchasing this product, please feel free to contact us. We are happy to serve you.
body.description: We believe that an encounter with every customer we meet is the beginning of a beautiful story, and we believe that our lives are better when we use better objects.Home is where we live, relax, sleep, read or work. Quality furniture and beautiful design make your home a warm haven.Trust us, choosing this affordable, comfortable and chic sofa is one of the better decisions you will make this year!Removable & Storage OttomanThe removable ottoman can be fixed to any seat, left, right or centre. You can place the ottoman to suit your preference and space. The extra storage feature under the seat allows you to store not only children's toys but also various items to keep the room looking neat and clean.Storage PocketsWith side storage pockets on either side of the sofa, keep everything within easy reach and organised, but out of sight! Use it to store your TV remote, mobile phone, glasses or the book you want to finish.Thoughtful DesignThe lower sides of the triple sofa and the lower side of the footstool are purposely velcroed to prevent sliding during recliner design use, making it more comfortable to use and you can spend more relaxing time with your family.Easy CareSimply use a vacuum cleaner or a clean cloth to remove dust. All seat cushions and backrests have zips for easy cleaning. The high metal legs allow the sweeper to pass easily without having to worry about dust on the floor.Specifications:Colour: dark greyMaterial: linen fabric, foam, metal, woodTriple sofa size: 78"*29"*33"Footrest size: 24"*23"*18.5"Product weight: 104 lbsWeight capacity: 800lbsWarm Note:1.All seat cushions and back cushions are vacuum compressed packaging.After opening the package,it will take some time for the cushion to return to its Place it in a ventilated place in the sun to accelerate its recovery.2.Due to manual measurement, there may be an error of 0.1-0.2". Please check that the size of our product meets your requirements before purchasing.3.There is a slight colour difference between the object and the monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: LOVE LOVE LOVE This couch it works perfect in my room. Super quick and easy to put together I'm 5'5" and 180 lbs and I think it's the perfect size. Not so deep my feet dangle. I don't feel the support system through cushions I do recommend opening the cushions as soon as you begin assembly to allow them time to fully expand. I have back issues and so far it isn't bothering my back I highly recommend it. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's really nice. Very small ..it's the right size for a studio/ one bedroom. The cushions could've been a little thicker. I don't foresee the durability of it going longer than over 2yrs. If you're one to highly frequent on your coach, But otherwise beautiful set and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth $250 plus $50 shipping AT ALL
reviews.reviewText: The material is cheap, the plastic feet don’t sit straight, the couch will not stay together and the Velcro to attach the ottomen won’t reach all the way. The picture gives it the feel that you’re going to get a comfy little couch with thick pillows and coushins but the reality is you’re going to get a flat lumpy block for everything. The fabric is very scratchy over all extremely dissatisfied and will be returning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't say to much about assembly due to I didn't do. My wife couldn't wait for me to come home so she did the assembly and had it all done. I will say she didn't ask for no type of help, but then she is a farm girl. The cushions don't look to be to much and would not think it would be as comfortable as it is. I will lay down and fall asleep on it and I have a thing about napping on couch. Appearance is more a modern look with frame being metal it is solid. Fabric reminds me of a good pair of wore in dinem jeans that you always love to wear. When I get more money I'm getting another for my basement bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: It was fairly easy to assemble. But if you try to pick it up, it basically falls apart. It’s not very comfortable. I would definitely not recommend buying this if you want comfort. It’s good for a small apartment. It’s probably good for a college kid. But I wouldn’t recommend it if you’re somebody that likes to hang out on the couch and watch TV. When you try to push the cushions in the entire couch, feels like it’s going to break in to two pieces. The back cushions do not seem to be as tall as they are in the picture. Because of my birthing situation, I missed the window to return it. If I could return it, I would. Now I have just stuck with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable ,fix the space I has give room a nice look
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Living space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but not small
reviews.reviewText: This couch is super cute and adorable, but it is smaller then we expected. Easy to assemble.it’s not big enough for lounging or living room, it’s good to have it in a kids bedroom or small office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Faulty part/Not Long Lasting
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Had to use an already assembled long screw to fit that gap in the picture. Overall, a horrible product. I just got it a little over a month ago, I’m only 115lbs and the cushions are already caved in. The pillows don’t puff up anymore than they did when they came out of packaging. You might as well just sit against the back of the chair. Tried to contact the brand, no response.
